name: Araiguma Rascal: Raccoon Rascal
overview: The 11 year old Robby North and his friend Oscar live in Wisconsin. During fishing they hear a shoot. A racoon-mother was shot. Robby takes the baby of this racoon with him and cares for it. The boy names the racoon Rascal. Guide Rascal through puzzles and trouble and find Robby!
